text:
Framer | Amsterdam | Fulltime, Onsite

http://framerjs.com

Code is the best tool designers are not using. Help us solve it with new creative tools. We're looking for a subset of skills in swift/obj-c/c/javascript/gl. Bonus points if you like working on editors, compilers/ast, animation frameworks, graphics.

Mail me for more info: koen@motif.co
